title: Yanni Salika

properties.value: Yanni Salika owns the antique store in Shilo Village, and is also the starting point for the One Small Favour quest. He is located north of the river. Yanni will buy many non-tradeable items that are made or gathered during quests, but are of no use after the quest has been completed.

Yanni Salika
Released27 January 2003 (Update)
MembersYes
RaceHuman

Sells itemsBeads of the dead

GenderMale

ExamineYanni Salika; he buys and sells antiques.
Map
Advanced data
NPC ID5361

Yanni Salika owns the antique store in Shilo Village, and is also the starting point for the One Small Favour quest. He is located north of the river. Yanni will buy many non-tradeable items that are made or gathered during quests, but are of no use after the quest has been completed.

After the completion of Shilo Village, he will buy the Tattered scroll, Crumpled scroll, Bervirius notes, Bone key, Stone-plaque, Locating crystal, and Beads of the dead. After the completion of Zogre Flesh Eaters, he will buy the Black prism.

Note that when you ask if he has any interesting items for sale, he will offer to sell back to you the Beads of the dead (for 1200 coins) or the Bone Key (for 100 coins), assuming that you did sell yours to him. He will also sell the player a replacement Steel key ring if it is lost, though all the keys on it will have to be added again.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
9 May 2013
(update | poll)

Yanni Salika will now sell you another bone key after completing Shilo Village so that you can revisit Rashiliyia's tomb. The key can now be added to the keyring.

22 February 2013
(update)

This content was included when the Old School RuneScape servers officially launched.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • In the quest One Small Favour, if the player asks where the jungle forester is, Yanni will say something about the Legends' Guild sending people to the jungle, and that only Zamorak knows why.
  • His chathead shows him with a moustache, although his model has a full beard.
